sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* MobIbSQL.xml : selectInCompleteList*/ EST_IN_DT estInDt, EST_IN_DT BK_DATE, WIB_BK_NO wibBkNo, CUST_ORD_NO ordNo, CTRT_NO ctrtNo, CTRT_NM ctrtNm, REF_NO refNo, WIB_BK_NO, CUST_ORD_NO, CTRT_NO, CTRT_NM, REF_NO, CARRIER_CD, CARRIER_NM, DEL, DLV_ORD_NO, EQ_NO, EQ_TP_CD, EST_IN_DT, EST_IN_HM, ETA, ETD, FWD_TP_CD, HBL_NO, INBOUND_BX_QTY, INBOUND_CBM, INBOUND_HM, INBOUND_SQFT, LOAD_TP_CD, MBL_NO, ORD_TP_CD, OWNER_CD, OWNER_ADDR1, OWNER_ADDR2, OWNER_ADDR3, OWNER_ADDR4, OWNER_ADDR5, OWNER_NM, POD, POD_NM, POL, POL_NM, RCV_CNT, RMK, RTP_NO, SUPP_ADDR1, SUPP_ADDR2, SUPP_ADDR3, SUPP_ADDR4, SUPP_ADDR5, SUPP_CD, SUPP_NM, TRUCKER_CD, TRUCKER_NM, VOY, VSL_CD, BK_STS_CD FROM ( SELECT C.WIB_BK_NO, CUST_ORD_NO, C.CTRT_NO, DBO.TL_GET_CTRT_NM(C.CTRT_NO) CTRT_NM, C.REF_NO, CARRIER_CD, DBO.TL_GET_CUST_NM (C.CARRIER_CD) CARRIER_NM, DEL, DLV_ORD_NO, EQ_NO, EQ_TP_CD, CASE WHEN C.EST_IN_DT IS NOT NULL THEN CONVERT (VARCHAR(10),C.EST_IN_DT,120) ELSE C.EST_IN_DT END AS EST_IN_DT, CASE C.EST_IN_HM WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING (C.EST_IN_HM, 1, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING (C.EST_IN_HM, 3, 2) END AS EST_IN_HM, ETA, ETD, FWD_TP_CD, HBL_NO, LTRIM(RTRIM (CONVERT(NUMERIC(10,0),ISNULL(C.INBOUND_BX_QTY,0)))) INBOUND_BX_QTY, LTRIM(RTRIM (CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),ISNULL(C.INBOUND_CBM,0)))) AS INBOUND_CBM, INBOUND_HM, INBOUND_SQFT, LOAD_TP_CD, MBL_NO, ORD_TP_CD, OWNER_CD, OWNER_ADDR1, OWNER_ADDR2, OWNER_ADDR3, OWNER_ADDR4, OWNER_ADDR5, dbo.TL_GET_CUST_NM (C.OWNER_CD) OWNER_NM, POD, DBO.TL_GET_LOC_NM (C.POD) AS POD_NM, POL, dbo.TL_GET_LOC_NM (C.POL) AS POL_NM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TL_WH_RCV RCV WHERE RCV.WIB_BK_NO = C.WIB_BK_NO) AS RCV_CNT, RMK, RTP_NO, SUPP_ADDR1, SUPP_ADDR2, SUPP_ADDR3, SUPP_ADDR4, SUPP_ADDR5, SUPP_CD, dbo.TL_GET_CUST_NM (C.SUPP_CD) AS SUPP_NM, TRUCKER_CD, dbo.TL_GET_CUST_NM (C.TRUCKER_CD) TRUCKER_NM, VOY, VSL_CD, CASE WHEN C.BK_STS_CD = 'I' AND LTRIM(C.IN_STS_CD) IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN C.BK_STS_CD = 'I' AND LTRIM(C.IN_STS_CD) IS NOT NULL THEN 'X' ELSE 'C' END BK_STS_CD FROM TL_WH_IB C
JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT WIB_BK_NO FROM TL_WH_IB_ITEM WHERE 1 = 1
AND WIB_BK_NO = #wibBkNo#
AND ITEM_CD = #itemCd#
) D ON C.WIB_BK_NO = D.WIB_BK_NO WHERE C.WH_CD = #userInfo.def_wh_cd#
AND C.CTRT_NO = #ctrtNo#
AND C.CUST_ORD_NO = #orderNo#
AND C.EST_IN_DT >= #fmDate#
AND C.EST_IN_DT <= #toDate#
) A WHERE 1=1
AND BK_STS_CD = #bkStsCd#
AND WIB_BK_NO = #wibBkNo#

SELECT /*MobIbSQL.xml : selectInCompleteItemList*/ I_ITEM.ITEM_SEQ, I_ITEM.ITEM_CD itemCd, I_ITEM.ITEM_CD, I_ITEM.ITEM_NM itemNm, I_ITEM.ITEM_NM, I_ITEM.ITEM_PKGUNIT itemPkgunit, I_ITEM.ITEM_PKGUNIT, I_ITEM.LOT_NO lotNo, I_ITEM.LOT_04 lot04, I_ITEM.LOT_05 lot05, I_ITEM.ITEM_PKGQTY itemPkgqty, I_ITEM.ITEM_PKGQTY, I_ITEM.ITEM_EA_QTY itemEaQty, I_ITEM.ITEM_EA_QTY, CONVERT(int,ISNULL(R_ITEM.SND_PKGQTY,(isnull(I_ITEM.ITEM_RCV_PKGQTY, 0)))) rcvPkgqty, CAST(ISNULL(R_ITEM.IN_ITEM_CBF,I_ITEM.ITEM_CBF) AS FLOAT) AS ITEM_CBF, CAST(ISNULL(R_ITEM.IN_ITEM_CBM,I_ITEM.ITEM_CBM) AS FLOAT) AS ITEM_CBM, CAST(ISNULL(R_ITEM.IN_ITEM_GRS_KGS,I_ITEM.ITEM_GRS_KGS) AS FLOAT) AS ITEM_GRS_KGS, CAST(ISNULL(R_ITEM.IN_ITEM_GRS_LBS,I_ITEM.ITEM_GRS_LBS) AS FLOAT) AS ITEM_GRS_LBS, CAST(ISNULL(R_ITEM.IN_ITEM_NET_KGS,I_ITEM.ITEM_NET_KGS) AS FLOAT) AS ITEM_NET_KGS, CAST(ISNULL(R_ITEM.IN_ITEM_NET_LBS,I_ITEM.ITEM_NET_LBS) AS FLOAT) AS ITEM_NET_LBS, I_ITEM.ITEM_SYS_NO, I_ITEM.MBL_NO, I_ITEM.UNLOAD_INBOUND_LOC_CD, I_ITEM.EXP_DT EXP_DT, R_ITEM.RCV_STS_CD,
I_ITEM.LIC_PLAT_NO, I_ITEM.ITEM_SER_NO
, ISNULL(C_ITEM.SERIAL_REQ_FLAG, 'N') AS SERIAL_REQ_FLAG , ISNULL(C_ITEM.SERIAL_UNIQ_FLAG, 'N') AS SERIAL_UNIQ_FLAG
FROM TL_WH_IB_ITEM I_ITEM LEFT JOIN TL_WH_RCV_ITEM R_ITEM ON I_ITEM.WIB_BK_NO = R_ITEM.WIB_BK_NO AND I_ITEM.PO_SYS_NO = R_ITEM.PO_SYS_NO AND I_ITEM.ITEM_SYS_NO = R_ITEM.ITEM_SYS_NO AND I_ITEM.ITEM_SEQ = R_ITEM.ITEM_SEQ
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT A.ITEM_CD , A.SERIAL_REQ_FLAG , A.SERIAL_UNIQ_FLAG FROM TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM A JOIN TL_WH_IB B ON A.CTRT_NO = B.CTRT_NO AND B.WIB_BK_NO = #wibBkNo# ) C_ITEM ON I_ITEM.ITEM_CD = C_ITEM.ITEM_CD
WHERE I_ITEM.WIB_BK_NO = #wibBkNo#
AND ITEM_CD = #itemCd#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE /*MobIbSQL.xml : modifyWHIbItemInfo*/ TL_WH_IB_ITEM SET LOT_NO = #lotNo#, LOT_04 = #lot04#, LOT_05 = #lot05#, EXP_DT = #exp_dt#, INBOUND_DT = #inbound_dt# WHERE ITEM_SYS_NO = #item_sys_no# AND ITEM_SEQ = #item_seq# AND WIB_BK_NO = #wib_bk_no#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT /*MobIbSQL.xml : selectIbPtawyList*/ * from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY T.WIB_IN_NO DESC) AS RN, T.*, (SELECT COUNT (1) FROM TL_WH_PUTAWAY_ITEM A WHERE A.WIB_IN_NO = T.WIB_IN_NO ) AS PUTAWAY_ITEM_CNT, (SELECT COUNT (1) FROM TL_WH_PUTAWAY A WHERE A.WIB_IN_NO = T.WIB_IN_NO ) AS PUTAWAY_CNT, CIW.FIX_LOC_CD, dbo.TL_GET_WH_LOC_NM (T.WH_CD, CIW.FIX_LOC_CD) AS FIX_LOC_NM, CASE WHEN CI.PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD = T.PKGUNIT THEN CI.PKG_LV1_PUT_TP_CD WHEN CI.ITEM_PKGUNIT = T.PKGUNIT THEN CI.PKG_LV2_PUT_TP_CD WHEN CI.PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD = T.PKGUNIT THEN CI.PKG_LV3_PUT_TP_CD WHEN CI.PKG_LV4_UNIT_CD = T.PKGUNIT THEN CI.PKG_LV4_PUT_TP_CD END PUT_TP_CD, CIL.LOT_ATTRIB_01 AS INBOUND_DT, ISNULL(CIL.LOT_ATTRIB_02, ' ') AS LOT_NO, ISNULL(CIL.LOT_ATTRIB_04, ' ') AS LOT_04, ISNULL(CIL.LOT_ATTRIB_05, ' ') AS LOT_05, ISNULL (CI.PKG_LV1_QTY, 0) AS PKG_LV1_QTY, CI.PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD AS PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD, ISNULL (CI.ITEM_PKGBASEQTY, 0) AS PKG_LV2_QTY, CI.ITEM_PKGUNIT AS PKG_LV2_UNIT_CD, ISNULL (CI.PKG_LV3_QTY, 0) AS PKG_LV3_QTY, CI.PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD AS PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD, ISNULL (CI.PKG_LV4_QTY, 0) AS PKG_LV4_QTY, CI.PKG_LV4_UNIT_CD AS PKG_LV4_UNIT_CD, ISNULL (CI.LV1_CBM, 0) AS LV1_CBM, ISNULL (CI.LV1_CBF, 0) AS LV1_CBF, ISNULL (CI.LV1_GRS_KGS, 0) AS LV1_GRS_KGS, ISNULL (CI.LV1_GRS_LBS, 0) AS LV1_GRS_LBS, ISNULL (CI.LV1_NET_KGS, 0) AS LV1_NET_KGS, ISNULL (CI.LV1_NET_LBS, 0) AS LV1_NET_LBS, CASE WHEN CIW.FIX_LOC_CD = T.INBOUND_LOC_CD THEN '' ELSE '+' END AS ROW_ADD, '' AS ROW_DEL, 1 AS ROW_ADD_QTY FROM ( SELECT RI.WIB_IN_NO, RI.WIB_BK_NO, RI.PO_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SEQ, PI.PUTAWAY_SEQ, RI.ITEM_CD, RI.ITEM_NM, RI.LOT_ID, RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD, R.WH_CD, dbo.TL_GET_LOC_NM (R.WH_CD) AS WH_NM, W.CTRT_NO, dbo.TL_GET_CTRT_NM (W.CTRT_NO) AS CTRT_NM, ISNULL(W.CUST_ORD_NO, ' ') AS CUST_ORD_NO, RI.INBOUND_LOC_CD, dbo.TL_GET_WH_LOC_NM (W.WH_CD, RI.INBOUND_LOC_CD) AS INBOUND_LOC_NM, dbo.TL_GET_WH_LOC_PROP_NM (W.WH_CD, RI.INBOUND_LOC_CD) AS INBOUND_LOC_PROP_NM, ISNULL( PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD, RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD ) AS RCV_SND_DMG_CD, ISNULL( CASE PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD WHEN 'S' THEN 'Sound' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Damage' END, RI.RECEIVED_TYPE ) AS RCV_SND_DMG_NM, RI.PKGUNIT, ISNULL(RI.PKGQTY, 0) AS PKGQTY, ISNULL(RI.EA_QTY, 0) AS EA_QTY, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_CBM, 0) AS RCV_CBM, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_CBF, 0) AS RCV_CBF, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_GRS_KGS, 0) AS RCV_GRS_KGS, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_GRS_LBS, 0) AS RCV_GRS_LBS, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_NET_KGS, 0) AS RCV_NET_KGS, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_NET_LBS, 0) AS RCV_NET_LBS, PI.PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD, dbo.TL_GET_WH_LOC_NM ( W.WH_CD, PI.PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD ) AS PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_NM, dbo.TL_GET_WH_LOC_PROP_NM (W.WH_CD, PI.PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD) AS PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_PROP_NM, PI.PUTAWAY_PKGUNIT, ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_PKGQTY, 0) AS PUTAWAY_PKGQTY, ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, 0) AS PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_CBM, 0) AS PUTAWAY_CBM, ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_CBF, 0) AS PUTAWAY_CBF, ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_GRS_KGS, 0) AS PUTAWAY_GRS_KGS, ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_GRS_LBS, 0) AS PUTAWAY_GRS_LBS, ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_NET_KGS, 0) AS PUTAWAY_NET_KGS, ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_NET_LBS, 0) AS PUTAWAY_NET_LBS, ISNULL(RI.EA_QTY, 0) - SUM (ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY RI.WIB_IN_NO, RI.WIB_BK_NO, RI.PO_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SEQ, ISNULL( PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD, RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD )) AS NON_PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_CBM, 0) - SUM (ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_CBM, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY RI.WIB_IN_NO, RI.WIB_BK_NO, RI.PO_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SEQ, ISNULL(PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD,RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD)) AS NON_PUTAWAY_CBM, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_CBF, 0) - SUM (ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_CBF, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY RI.WIB_IN_NO, RI.WIB_BK_NO, RI.PO_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SEQ, ISNULL(PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD,RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD)) AS NON_PUTAWAY_CBF, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_GRS_KGS, 0) - SUM (ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_GRS_KGS, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY RI.WIB_IN_NO,RI.WIB_BK_NO,RI.PO_SYS_NO,RI.ITEM_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SEQ, ISNULL(PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD,RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD)) AS NON_PUTAWAY_GRS_KGS, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_GRS_LBS, 0) - SUM (ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_GRS_LBS, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY RI.WIB_IN_NO, RI.WIB_BK_NO, RI.PO_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SEQ, ISNULL(PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD,RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD)) AS NON_PUTAWAY_GRS_LBS, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_NET_KGS, 0) - SUM (ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_NET_KGS, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY RI.WIB_IN_NO, RI.WIB_BK_NO, RI.PO_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SEQ, ISNULL(PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD,RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD)) AS NON_PUTAWAY_NET_KGS, ISNULL(RI.IN_ITEM_NET_LBS, 0) - SUM (ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_NET_LBS, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY RI.WIB_IN_NO,RI.WIB_BK_NO,RI.PO_SYS_NO,RI.ITEM_SYS_NO,RI.ITEM_SEQ,ISNULL(PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD,RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD)) AS NON_PUTAWAY_NET_LBS, PI.INV_CHG_FLG, PI.PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD AS OLD_PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD, ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, 0) AS OLD_PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, (CASE (ISNULL(PI.WIB_IN_NO, '')) WHEN '' THEN 'NEW' ELSE 'UPDATE' END) AS EDIT_FLAG, ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TL_WH_INV_LOT II WHERE RI.WIB_BK_NO = II.WIB_BK_NO AND RI.PO_SYS_NO = II.PO_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SYS_NO = II.ITEM_SYS_NO AND RI.LOT_ID = II.LOT_ID AND II.ALLC_QTY > 0 ) AS OB_CNT, RI.RGST_TIMESTAMP, (CASE WHEN P.WIB_IN_NO IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END ) AS PUT_YN, P.SUPV_NM ,(CASE WHEN P.PUTAWAY_DT IS NULL THEN (SELECT (CONVERT(VARCHAR,(CONVERT(DATETIME,P.PUTAWAY_DT)), 112))) ELSE P.PUTAWAY_DT END ) AS PUTAWAY_DT , CASE ISNULL(P.PUTAWAY_HM_FR, 'NULL') WHEN 'NULL' THEN P.PUTAWAY_HM_FR ELSE CASE P.PUTAWAY_HM_FR WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(P.PUTAWAY_HM_FR, 0, 3) + ':' + SUBSTRING(P.PUTAWAY_HM_FR, 3, LEN(P.PUTAWAY_HM_FR)) END END AS PUTAWAY_HM_FR ,CASE ISNULL(P.PUTAWAY_HM_TO, 'NULL') WHEN 'NULL' THEN P.PUTAWAY_HM_TO ELSE CASE P.PUTAWAY_HM_TO WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTRING(P.PUTAWAY_HM_TO, 0, 3) + ':' + SUBSTRING(P.PUTAWAY_HM_TO, 3, LEN(P.PUTAWAY_HM_TO)) END END AS PUTAWAY_HM_TO, P.WORK_NM, P.MSG_TO_WK, RI.LIC_PLAT_NO AS inbound_lcs_plt, PI.PUTAWAY_LIC_PLAT_NO AS putaway_lcs_plt FROM TL_WH_RCV R JOIN ( SELECT WIB_IN_NO, WIB_BK_NO, PO_SYS_NO, ITEM_SYS_NO, ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CD, ITEM_NM, LOT_ID, IN_ITEM_CBM, IN_ITEM_CBF, IN_ITEM_GRS_KGS, IN_ITEM_GRS_LBS, IN_ITEM_NET_KGS, IN_ITEM_NET_LBS ,(CASE l WHEN 1 THEN INBOUND_LOC_CD ELSE CASE l WHEN 2 THEN DMG_LOC_CD END END ) AS INBOUND_LOC_CD ,(CASE l WHEN 1 THEN 'S' WHEN 2 THEN 'D' END ) AS RECEIVED_TYPE_CD, (CASE l WHEN 1 THEN 'Sound' WHEN 2 THEN 'Damage' END ) AS RECEIVED_TYPE, (CASE l WHEN 1 THEN SND_PKGUNIT WHEN 2 THEN DMG_PKGUNIT END ) AS PKGUNIT, (CASE l WHEN 1 THEN SND_PKGQTY WHEN 2 THEN DMG_PKGQTY END ) AS PKGQTY, (CASE l WHEN 1 THEN SND_EA_QTY WHEN 2 THEN DMG_EA_QTY END ) AS EA_QTY, RGST_TIMESTAMP, LIC_PLAT_NO FROM ( SELECT RI.* FROM TL_WH_RCV_ITEM RI INNER JOIN TL_WH_IB WI ON RI.WIB_BK_NO = WI.WIB_BK_NO WHERE 1=1
AND WI.CTRT_NO = #ctrtNo#
AND WI.WH_CD = #userInfo.def_wh_cd#
AND RI.ITEM_CD = #itemCd#
) AS T, (SELECT 1 AS l UNION SELECT 2) AS l ) AS RI ON R.WIB_IN_NO = RI.WIB_IN_NO JOIN TL_WH_IB W ON R.WIB_BK_NO = W.WIB_BK_NO JOIN TL_WH_IB_ITEM WI ON W.WIB_BK_NO = WI.WIB_BK_NO AND RI.WIB_BK_NO = WI.WIB_BK_NO AND RI.PO_SYS_NO = WI.PO_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SYS_NO = WI.ITEM_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SEQ = WI.ITEM_SEQ LEFT JOIN TL_WH_PUTAWAY P ON R.WIB_IN_NO = P.WIB_IN_NO LEFT JOIN TL_WH_PUTAWAY_ITEM PI ON RI.WIB_IN_NO = PI.WIB_IN_NO AND RI.WIB_BK_NO = PI.WIB_BK_NO AND RI.PO_SYS_NO = PI.PO_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SYS_NO = PI.ITEM_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SEQ = PI.ITEM_SEQ AND RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD = PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD WHERE 1=1
AND W.CTRT_NO = #ctrtNo#
AND W.CUST_ORD_NO = #orderNo#
AND RI.INBOUND_LOC_CD = #frLocCd#
AND RI.EA_QTY > 0
) AS T LEFT JOIN TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_WH CIW ON T.CTRT_NO = CIW.CTRT_NO AND T.ITEM_SYS_NO = CIW.ITEM_SYS_NO AND T.ITEM_SYS_NO = CIW.ITEM_SYS_NO AND T.WH_CD = CIW.WH_CD LEFT JOIN TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM CI ON T.CTRT_NO = CI.CTRT_NO AND T.ITEM_SYS_NO = CI.ITEM_SYS_NO LEFT JOIN TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT CIL ON T.CTRT_NO = CIL.CTRT_NO AND T.ITEM_SYS_NO = CIL.ITEM_SYS_NO AND T.LOT_ID = CIL.LOT_ID
) as TTT WHERE 1 = 1 AND WIB_IN_NO + WIB_BK_NO + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ITEM_SYS_NO) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ITEM_SEQ) NOT IN (select WIB_IN_NO + WIB_BK_NO + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ITEM_SYS_NO) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ITEM_SEQ)from TL_WH_PUTAWAY_ITEM where WIB_IN_NO = TTT.WIB_IN_NO)
AND WIB_IN_NO = #wibInNo#
AND LOT_ID = #lotId#
AND ITEM_SEQ = #itemSeq#
ORDER BY TTT.CUST_ORD_NO ASC, TTT.WIB_BK_NO ASC, TTT.WIB_IN_NO ASC, TTT.RGST_TIMESTAMP ASC, TTT.ITEM_CD ASC, TTT.ITEM_SEQ ASC, TTT.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD DESC, TTT.PUTAWAY_SEQ ASC
